chapters.title: Chapter 22: To Make an Anchor Weep
chapters.info: Shielyn din Sabura Night Waters, p. 469—Windfinder to Zaida, wavemistress of Clan Catelar. She is tall, slender, and cooly reserved. She is almost as tall as Aviendha. Like all Windfinders to Clan Wavemistresses, she wears eight earrings on one ear.
